installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# starmade Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt -y install curl

cd /mnt/server

wget -O starter.jar http://files.star-made.org/StarMade-Starter.jar

java -jar starter.jar -nogui

mv ./StarMade/* ./
rm -r ./StarMade

## install end
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
